title: Excellent Block Of 10 Perches High Elevation 1.2 Km. From Thalawathugoda Junction 20 Ft. Rd.-1.45 Mn. P.P.
details:
This Solid Block of 10 Perches is Located At. Weerasekera Mw. Along Hokandara Rd. 1..2 Km. From Thalawathugoda City Centre.
Upto the Land is 20 Ft. Wide Access Rd. Almost Square in Shape.
Calm & Quiet Neighborhood.

Price Quoted above is as indicated by the Owner.
NB: Genuine buyers are encouraged & invited to make reasonable offers after inspection of the Property irrespective of the Price Quoted. Since the Sale will take place at the Best Offer Received.
